channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0213; 03:55AM; 17619 W Rinaldi St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46xDrIy; #GranadaHills; 39 LAFD Firefighters took 43 minutes in defensive firefighting operations to extinguish flames in a vacant 1,715 square-foot two story home that was fully involved with fire on their arrival. No injury. Though the structure - heavily damaged by this fire, may have been formerly used for a marijuana grow operation, the specific cause of the fire remains under investigation.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E28 E287 E290 E8 E87 EM15 RA18 RA70 RA87 T75 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0213; 03:12AM; 17619 W Rinaldi St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46xDrIy; #GranadaHills; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations at a vacant two story home fully involved with fire.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E28 E287 E290 E8 E87 EM15 RA18 RA70 RA87 T75 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#0949; 03:00PM; 9627 N Noble Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46dtGzC; #NorthHills; On further inspection, it was determined that the two-story residence to the north did suffered some minor damage from the fire. No Injuries have been reported, and the fire cause remains under active investigation.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E239 E287 E298 E39 E7 E81 RA7 RA87 T39 T87 T98; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0949; 02:30PM; 9627 N Noble Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46dtGzC; #NorthHills; Address Corrected to the rear of 9627 Noble Avenue. 32 LAFD Firefighters took just 17 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish a well involved 10' x 15' shed to the rear of one-story home, that contained an unspecified number of 55 gallon drums of a yet to be determined type oil. The fire was prevented from damaging a two-story residence to the north. No Injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E239 E287 E298 E39 E7 E81 RA7 RA87 T39 T87 T98; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0949; 02:13PM; 9637 N Noble Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rwjnrd; #NorthHills; *Address Tentative*: PRELIM: Offensive firefight at a well involved structure to the rear of a single family home. One civilian being assessed for possible injury.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E239 E287 E298 E39 E7 E81 RA7 RA87 T39 T87 T98; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0777; 12:37PM; 956 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZIs2ni; MidWilshire; Address Confirmed as 956 S Crenshaw Blvd. 39 LAFD Firefighters took less than 15 minutes in largely defensive operations, to access, confine and extinguish a fully involved 50' x 35' vacant one-story residential conversion to a commercial property. No injury. No fire threat or damage to nearby structures. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E13 E226 E229 E26 E261 E29 RA26 RA61 RA826 SO1 T26 T29 T61; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#0777; 12:34PM; 956 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZIs2ni; #MidWilshire; *Address Remains Tentative*. Now Defensive firefight at a 50' x 35' vacant one-story residence converted to commercial, fully involved with fire. No injury. No threat to nearby structures. ; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E13 E226 E229 E26 E261 E29 RA26 RA61 RA826 T26 T29 T61; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0777; 12:22PM; 956 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZIs2ni; #MidWilshire; PRELIM: Offensive firefighting operations at a vacant one-story commercial building with heavy fire showing. ; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E13 E226 E229 E26 E261 RA61 RA826 T26 T29 T61; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Fatal Traffic Collision; INC#0276; 06:27AM; NB 405 Fwy x Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tbz9Z6; #VanNuys; PRELIM: Multi-vehicle collision with 4 patients total: One is deceased at scene. Three others with unspecified injuries, two of whom are anticipated to be transported by LAFD ambulance. No further details. #LATrafffic: Closure of one or more northbound lanes of the San Diego (I-405) Freeway at Sherman Way until CHP and Medical Examiner operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. Media Inquiries: CHP West Valley (Log #410) and Medical Examiner.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; E39 E90 RA39 RA839; CH8; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0201; 05:10AM; 16930 W Tupper St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ro3aEH; Northridge; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 32 minutes with no injuries reported. The contents of the home indicate a marijuana grow operation and LAPD is on scene to handle the investigation. The fire extended into the attic and firefighters on the roof are conducting an extensive ventilation (strip) operation with an additional truck company enroute to assist. No further details.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC15 E103 E275 E287 E290 E87 E90 RA87 RA903 T75 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart
